annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Explicitly importing specific items from a module can improve code readability and maintainability.
label: best_practice
reason: Explicitly importing specific items from a module can improve code readability and maintainability.

annotation: ⚠️ SAST Risk (Low): Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace pollution and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace.
label: sast_risk
reason: Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace pollution and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace.

annotation: 🧠 ML Signal: Aggregating __all__ lists from multiple modules indicates a pattern of re-exporting symbols.
label: ml_signal
reason: Aggregating __all__ lists from multiple modules indicates a pattern of re-exporting symbols.
